title: Implementation in a heartbeat, impact forever
subtitle: naubion is designed to be integrated seamlessly into your existing infrastructure and to help you reduce your application's carbon footprint with minimal effort.

easyImplementation.title: Easy implementation
easyImplementation.description: Simply add a snippet of code in both the frontend and the backend of your application

monitoring.title: Monitor your app
monitoring.description: Access an insightful dashboard with live and accurate data about your app environmental footprint

reduce.title: Reduce your footprint
reduce.description: Reduce the carbon footprint of your application by understanding better your usage and the impact of your code

report.title: Report on your impact
report.description: Report on your application's environmental footprint to legal instances

communicate.title: Communicate to your users
communicate.description: Communicate transparently on your footprint and your actions to reduce it
